rules_text:
Flying, trample
[i]Metalcraft[/i] – As long as you control three or more artifacts, equipment spells you cast cost {3} less to cast.
rules_text2:
Certhina Gladiator enters with two +1/+1 counters on it.
Whenever a artifact is put into an opponents graveyard from the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on Certhina Gladiator.
{T}: Destroy target artifact creature with lesser power than Certhina Gladiator.
